spaceSetting.title: Settings

pin.empty: Your pined bases and space will appear here

tip.delete: Are you sure you want to delete <0/>?
tip.title: Tips
tip.exportTips1: Export the current base as a .tea file, which may take some time. You can check the export results in the notification center.
tip.exportTips2: You can import the .tea file in space -> more -> import
tip.exportTips3: Cross-base relation fields will be converted to single line text.

sharedBase.title: Shared with me

sharedBase.empty: No bases shared with me yet

aiSetting.title: AI Settings

aiSetting.enableTips: Enable AI to use AI features in your space instead of using the system AI
